We have both Echo and Google Dot. Echo is great for controlling the FireTV, and has better hearing than Google Dot, however, Google Dot understands my wife's accent, and has a smarter response.
reviews.review_header: Work with FireTV, but not good as Google Dot mini

reviews.review_text: WOW!! Way to go Amazon! The amazon echo dot plays my amazon prime and pandora music, reads the bible, reads my kindle books, tells jokes, tells me the time , the date, answers questions . She learns new things and is incredibly fascinating.

I absolutely love these. After purchasing the first one and experiencing its versatility, I immediately began purchasing other units for various areas of my house. We have them integrated with Philip's Hue bulbs, Wemo light remotes and Lux thermostats and now our 1970's built home is a smart house! We are living like Iron Man and it's awesome. Now if they could just reprogram to answer to Jarvis....

I really like Alexa, I talk to her everyday. Haven't ventured out and bought the stuff to work with her yet, like the light bulbs so when you walk into the door and its dark inside you can say, Alexa, turn the living room light on. But what a great start.
I only wish the speaker were a little louder. I have other bluetooth speakers this size or smaller, with a much better sound and volume capability.
reviews.review_header: with a much better sound and volume capability

reviews.review_text: not bad, just as good or a little better than the Google home mini. the only downside to the echo dot is the speaker is not that good.
reviews.review_header: not bad, just as good or a little better than ...

reviews.review_text: Too soon to tell , but so far Alexa responds well to commands. I don't prefer saying "alexa" all the time, so maybe I can come up with a one syllable name like "Spot"

More a toy. Can not answer most simple questions or srarches. Does not understand a lot. It plays music ok, but can not find a lot of what you may want. Google has better results to searches and questions. But for $49.95 it is a simple toy that makes you smile for first week or 2
reviews.review_header: A toy that can be a pain with all she does not know

reviews.review_text: Still learning Alexa but so convenient to have Schedules, plays music, games, turns on lights, unlocks doors...it’s my own assistant
reviews.review_header: Modern day clapper and then some

reviews.review_text: Fast shipping. A little disappointed that I can't use it in the car as I had planned, but that is me not reading the product details in depth. As soon as I can, I will be getting the upscale version for my home. This one is working great for my office!
reviews.review_header: A little disappointed that I can't use it in the car as ...

reviews.review_text: i use it once in a while for weather or music. usually cant play the song i want to hear and cant often answer what i want to know. not a good match
I already have an echo so the dot just gave me access from another room. Works seemlessly. Only noticeable thing is the drop in audio quality but that was expected
reviews.review_header: Functionally the same as the echo

reviews.review_text: I'm loving my little Echo and I think it's a lot of fun. My son loves it as well. Probably going to have to get him his own. It's great for most things, could use some work with knowing more answers instead of sending you to wiki to find out for yourself. ;)
reviews.review_header: It's a lot of fun, looking forward to updates that make it better.

reviews.review_text: I was expecting it to have everything on it. No clue I had to load it with skills. Half of them I don’t even know what to ask for. We hardly ever use them except for an alarm clock. You have to pay for music-I have a radio for that. Mostly I hear I’m sorry I do not know that information or info I didn’t even ask for. So I just go to my phone and ask goo-goo. It’s easier and nothing has to be loaded. She tells you to go to your alexia app all the time so what’s the point? Should of went with goo-goo.
I love this thing. I have it set timers, alarms. It gives me scores. Anything I ask. Love Love Love.. I paired with with a bluetooth speaker for a little better sound quality.
reviews.review_header: A great gadget to have around..

reviews.review_text: You can really tell where this is going to be in about 2-3 years. Unfortunately it isn't 2-3 years from now. :( Almost there. Need the ability to respond from internal speakers but play my audio through the 1/8". That would make this thing infinitely more useful.
reviews.review_header: That would make this thing infinitely more useful.

reviews.review_text: I love my Echo, but I dislike that it requires its own USB brick plug. I would prefer either a standard barrel plug type power cord or for it to run on standard USB power. I don't really see the need for USB when you require 9V or whatever over the cable.
reviews.review_header: Love the Dot itself. Wish it didn't have its own PSU.

reviews.review_text: I hooked these up to kicker speakers and the sound is absolutely what I wanted. I will say the only thing is that I recommend the use of a power amp to push the sound a bit harder. Is lacking on the EQ settings. I would like to be able to adjust the treble and bass. Power amp solves that.
reviews.review_header: I will say the only thing is that I recommend the use of a power amp to push the ...

reviews.review_text: I live in a small apartment, and I have a Bluetooth soundbar, and a Bluetooth speaker in the shower (works better on the soundbar; can't talk to it/control it when I'm in the shower). The function I use the most on it is adding items to my shopping list.
reviews.review_header: Works perfect for a small area (or a connected speaker).

reviews.review_text: I do appreciate many of it's handy features, but it has far too much trouble hearing and understanding me. I'm from an area of the midwest that is considered to have no discernable accent, I enunciate clearly, yet it still misunderstands me daily, if it hears me at all. Asking for music is particularly frustrating. Sometimes it can't even tell the difference between "on" and "off", which is simply unacceptable. I can't live without it, yet I'm always arguing with it. It must know my ex-wife.
reviews.review_header: The Most Essential Tech That Fails Every Day

reviews.review_text: Alexa is amazing. The Echo dot is so convenient and reliable. It's like having a person with you. She's so polite. When for fun I said "Alexa, you're smart," she replied thank you. It's amazing, practical and fun. I wouldn't give her up for anything.

I purchased the dot 2nd generation for my husband for Christmas, Love at first sight He sits and listens to his music all night long, we are going to smarten up some other things in the house but I have to say I was pleasantly amazed a lot of bang for your buck.

It's nice to have hands free control to access the lights and search features. I enjoyed laying in the dark setting alarms, getting the weather updates and playing music by voice commands. There are lots of features that are yet to be explored. I asked some simple search queries though and got " I'm sorry, I don't know that" fairly often. I would expect that if I asked the meaning of life but was disappointed when some of these simpler queries failed. Overall this is a pretty good device.
reviews.review_header: It's nice to have hands free control to access the lights ...

reviews.review_text: I could never get it to work, My daughter could never get it to work, My grand Kids could never get it to work. Enough said. Sent it back and got a prompt refund.

I own two Alexa's. This dot stopped working after 1 year. I was a big fan of Alexa but not if you have to replace a $50 device every year. Amazon only gave a 15% off credit to buy a new one. I'm trying my luck with a Lenovo Smart display with google. Hopefully it lasts longer. Goodbye Alexa, tell your boss to supply a better warranty.

Not great, Had to return first device which arrived dead. Second device has started not responding. Then seems to work ok after being unplugged and replugged in. Not happy with quality and too late to return for a replacement.
My echo dot when I play music the music breaks up through Bluetooth so I have to unplug and plug back in for it to work properly
reviews.review_header: Music interference when playing on Bluetooth

reviews.review_text: We already have the Echo so adding the dot to extend functionality to another room was an easy decision. Setup was done in seconds and we now have the same great voice control in our master bedroom. Sits elegantly on a small table just working each time when called upon.

The Echo is much better than the Echo Dot . . . would not buy another Echo Dot. It doesn't work as well as the regular Echo. I tell it to play music by a certain artist. Alexa Dot says shuffling music by said artist . . . then it plays only one song and quits. Seems it hasn't programmed itself as well as Echo.
reviews.review_header: The Echo is much better than the Echo Dot

reviews.review_text: I love having the Echo Dot. I put one in my bedroom and got rid of my alarm clock/radio. It doesn't take up as much room and when I wake up in the middle of the night without my glasses I can just ask Alexia what time it is.

Absolutely love it. Easy to set an alarm for mornings. Sports scores on demand (once you set it up properly). The best feature I think is the ability to play music from Amazon Prime. Millions of songs are available without having to pay extra for Amazon Music.
reviews.review_header: Absolutely love it. Easy to set an alarm for mornings

reviews.review_text: Loads of fun. You can get weather/I ask that all the time!, news, play music, and ask some questions. Sometimes Alexa doesn't know the answer and will say "I don't know that." I listened to Joni Mitchell yesterday. Wonderful. I think I need a second one for the Living Room, and you can link them together.
reviews.review_header: Loads of fun. You can get weather/I ask that all the ...

reviews.review_text: Very addicting devices. I use for controlling lights, alarm clock, soothing music to fall asleep to and asking for weather forecast. They work great. Takes some getting used to as you learn the best use of commands but the Dot understands my voice very well.
It's always been able to recognize my voice, and even from further across the room! The speakers are also very good for the Echo Dot's size. I bought another even though it wasn't really necessary!

Is like having a smart friend to answer all questions!!! We really like it. We get the news in the morning while preparing for work and the weather update. She plays our favorite music list and tell us jokes too!!

I have a full size Amazon Echo and a Google Home. I have tested both and the Echo outperforms in every way. I bought two dots for my kids’ rooms along with Amazon Fire TV sticks. The kids love them. Easy to use for everyone, and the kids love that they can send voice messages to the other devices in the other rooms. Great product and learning new skills every day. I highly recommend.
reviews.review_header: Excellent Product, Easy to use, and affordable

reviews.review_text: Love the echo dot- music, weather, time and just asking general questions... due to the Echo, I have become a much more proficient Jeapordy player😂. It’s a overall wonderful device in this I need information right now society. Affordably priced also!

I love the Echo Dot! It has expanded my Alexa connection to my bedroom with my Echo filling up our living and dining rooms with full sound. Highly recommend this gem and when paired with blue tooth speakers the sound is amazing. Super fast shipping and great price!

It works great. It nearly always responds to commands and the home control feature helps integrate unrelated peripherals into one software application. I want it to do more. Keep the development going.

This simplifies music streaming. It has huge potential because of add-on "skills" and integration with IFTTT. If you don't geek out over things like IFTTT, you can enjoy the excellent voice recognition and built-in integration with your favorite music providers.
reviews.review_header: It has all been said before. I like it.

reviews.review_text: Literally, the only difference is the speaker. I have 1 Eco on the main floor, and a dot upstairs and down. I can talk in a regular voice anywhere in the house and be heard. It's fantastic! I only wish that when you play music on one, or set a timer, it would play on all.
reviews.review_header: Works just as well as the Eco

reviews.review_text: This has changed the way we function in our house! My son is using it frequently to listen to music, check the weather, etc. As a person with a chronic illness, sometimes the convenience of turning off a light without having to get up, and controlling our fire Tv stick without having to find the remote, saves me a lot of spoons.
reviews.review_header: Can’t wait to get more of these!

reviews.review_text: Great little speaker. I have purchased 5 of them. for my teenage granddaughers....they love it. My home and busness office and just added one to the back patio
If I could return this, I would. Not as helpful as you'd think... can't ask it questions like google... Takes forever to send people messages.
reviews.review_header: can't ask it questions like google.

reviews.review_text: I bought this so I could be lazy and turn off lights without leaving my bed. Now I have not left my bed in many days. Alexa, help me
Love my Echo Dot's I have 3 of these around the house. Makes life easy if you have a smart home. Answers questions and gives you instant information. Great buy!
reviews.review_header: Love my Echo Dot's I have 3 of these around ...

reviews.review_text: I got this one mainly so my wife could listen to different sounds when going to sleep, having the ability to turn the downstair's lights off instead of telling the echo in the living room while walking upstairs is great as well.
reviews.review_header: having the ability to turn the downstair's lights off instead of telling the echo in the living room while walking upstairs is great as well

reviews.review_text: I bought mine at Best Buy. I was looking for an Internet radio option for my car without having to use my cell phone. I have a wifi Hotspot and this connects to it and streams music and books to my stereo. It is small enough to fit in an small pocket in the dash.
reviews.review_header: Perfet for internet radio in the car.

reviews.review_text: Alexa, we love you! The Amazon Echo technical team was also excellent to help me why Alexa wasn’t able to discover my smart plugs; make sure it’s in the right profile when Alexa is being shared by multiple members in the household.
reviews.review_header: we love you! The Amazon Echo technical team was also ...

reviews.review_text: For this low price, the Echo packs in a lot of fun functions and plays music well in my bedroom. The speaker isn't great so I'd advise to hook it to a portable speaker or your stereo system for the small Echo. Does everything Alexa does except not as good a speaker
reviews.review_header: the Echo packs in a lot of fun functions and plays music well in my bedroom

reviews.review_text: We bought a few for different rooms and love it. Use them to play music throughout the house while cleaning, use as intercom, and integrate so easily with our nest.

I love listening to music, but bringing up music on the computer or radio is too much bother. With my Echo Dot it is easy and fun. I can even get sirius-XM radio and listen to the Garth channel. I love getting local weather conditions just by asking Alexa.

Love it almost as much as Alexa. Do miss the speakers but it's being used where that doesn't matter too much and the difference in price makes up for it. (Note - son gave me a portable bluetooth speaker so I'm good to go!)

This is my third Echo device. I really enjoy having them. I like the small size of the Dot. Wish the sound was better, but it's not bad. They are very handy when you want to obtain information and for a smart home.

We LOVE the Echo Dot. I am finding more and more uses every day. I had read a lot about the lack of a built in speaker on the Dot, but I have found it to be a decent, stand alone speaker. I love that we can plug it into our stereo or use via bluetooth. It is fun, useful and really COOL!
reviews.review_header: Why didn't I get one of these sooner?

reviews.review_text: Let's keep it short and simple. This is a complete NO-BRAINER!! For $30 you get a mini-computer, and more!. If you don't have a brain then this may help you develop one!! LOL =) Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!!!
We have three now, that's how much we love our Echo dots. They integrate with smart home things we have in the house as well, which is an added bonus!
reviews.review_header: that's how much we love our Echo dots

reviews.review_text: The sound could be better, but everything else is fantastic! We love the Echo Dot! I wish there were more skills, but I have found that in many cases it's the 3rd party's app that is lacking
